text: Sit back and watch as corporate actions such as dividends and share splits are automatically incorporated into your portfolio.
Track your shares, mutual funds, ETFs, listed bonds, fixed assets, and more ­ all in one place, regardless of broker or history.
Easily run reports for Taxable Income, Capital Gains Tax (CGT), Unrealised Capital Gains Tax, Foreign Investment Funds (FIF), Historical Cost, and more.
